name: Level 5
description:
This is a sick basketball game I've been making for a couple weeks. 13 game modes, 5 levels, 9 characters. Check it out,  it's tite.

i push a new a new build every 2 week or so with new levels and characters. working on AI stuff too and a online leaderboard

this is a link to the most up to date info and change logs 

https://bit.ly/3cUksw4

controls: keyboard + mouse, xbox controller mostly supported. see readme in above link.

Direction : W,A,S,D, left stick

Run : direction + left shift, press left stick down

Jump : right mouse/ space, A

Shoot : left mouse / left ctrl, X

Call ball to player :  left mouse / left ctrl , X

Enable Moneyball : F, (none for xbox yet, coming in a patch)

start game or whatever : enter, space / X

Toggle always run : left shift + 1 Default : ON

Toggle ui stats : left shift + 2 Default : OFF
